dir-section.heading: Culture
dir-section.p: Belgrade typically holds a number of annual cultural festivals, including festivals of film and classical music.

org-entry.content-note: organizes literary and philosophical-sociological presentations, concerts, exhibitions, film viewings, theatre productions and festivals, including Festival of European and Independent Film (EURO-IN FILM), Novi Sad Jazz Festival and International Festival of Alternative and New Theatre (INFANT)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Serbian Academy of Arts and Sciences

org-entry.content-note: collection of Serbian art in Vojvodina from the end of the 16th century to the present

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Institute for the Study of Cultural Development

org-entry.content-note: sections on archaeology, ethnology, history and applied art
theatre productions, contemporary and classical drama
theatre production, touring, international cultural co-operation, BITEF festival org.
studio theatre presenting experimental and contemporary drama by Serbian and international playwrights

address.verbatim-address: 11000 Belgrade, Kralja Milana 50, c/o Fakultet muzičke umetnosti

org-entry.content-note: organizes the International Tribune of Composers, a festival of contemporary music
literary, scientific, cultural and publishing society
